doc:
Simone Signoret https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simone_Signoret 0 Simone Signoret (French: [simɔn siɲɔʁɛ]; 25 March 1921 – 30 September 1985) was a French cinema actress often hailed as one of France's greatest film stars. She became the second French person to win an Academy Award, for her role in Room at the Top (1959).
In her lifetime she also received two Césars, three BAFTAs, an Emmy, a Cannes Film Festival Award, the Silver Bear for Best Actress awards, an NBR Award and a Golden Globe nomination. Simone_Signoret ( French : [_simɔn_siɲɔʁɛ_] ; 25_March_1921 – 30_September_1985 ) was a_French_cinema_actress often hailed as one of France 's_greatest_film_stars . She became the_second_French_person to_win an_Academy_Award , for her_role in Room at the_Top_(_1959_) . In her_lifetime she also received two_Césars , three_BAFTAs , an_Emmy , a_Cannes_Film_Festival_Award , the_Silver Bear_for_Best_Actress_awards , an_NBR_Award and a_Golden_Globe_nomination .
